pages: SAVING THE PAST - TEXT RESTORATION         September 9th, 2024                         by Stu                                                       In December 2023, I was made aware    that a former Habitat user named Wil1 had a website featuring old Habitat   images.                                                                     It turns out, these images were taken from 1988-era video footage.                                                                   1

SAVING THE PAST - TEXT RESTORATIONI was shocked that any footage of Hab had survived. Before this, only Keith Elkin aka CNetRep128 had captured any live footage of the place. What were  the chances that 35+ years later I'd  uncover something new?                                                      So I got to e-mailing with Wil1 and henot only still had the tapes, but he  was willing to send them to me for a  fresh transfer.                                          2

SAVING THE PAST - TEXT RESTORATIONI'd already been involved with trans- ferring old game footage in the past, so I asked Live Music historian, Nick Serra from LiveNirvana.com if he'd be willing to transfer this magical find.                                      Nick had previously transferred over  10+ hours of Club Caribe footage.                                           Nick agreed and the remaining pieces  fell into place.                                         3

SAVING THE PAST - TEXT RESTORATIONNone of us were prepared for what we  were going to see.                                                          Not only was there 2+ hours of footageof the End of Habitat Pilot Test      party, affectionately dubbed the "BetaBlast", but 2 more hours of Wil1 in   his turf, going through many back     issues of The Rant newspaper and othermiscellaneous documents.                                                                       4

SAVING THE PAST - TEXT RESTORATION    We had truly hit the jackpot.                                           Documented here were key events from  the Habitat pilot test that were laterreferenced in the influential         "Lessons of Lucasfilm's Habitat" paperby Chip Morningstar and Randy Farmer.                                       Only in much greater detail, with     names, places, times and dates.                                                                5

SAVING THE PAST - TEXT RESTORATION We were able to get the dates for    when certain events happened or when  areas of Habitat had opened up to the public.                                                                      We were able to see a glimpse into   the psyche of the Habitat world as it was at the time.                                                             History long since forgotten had beenreclaimed from the void.                                 6

SAVING THE PAST - TEXT RESTORATION You are now able to read all of theseback issues of The Rant and other     documents here in NeoHabitat thanks tothe hard work of the following people who donated their free time and love  for this absolutely groundbreaking    virtual world service, to ensure that these pioneers are never forgotten.                                         Credits begin on the next page...                                                              7

SAVING THE PAST - TEXT RESTORATION               CREDITS                                                      Randy Farmer - Without his efforts,    NeoHabitat would not exist and you    wouldn't be reading this.                                                  Chip Morningstar - Ditto.                                                   Wil1 - Wils ingenuity meant a part of  the original Habitat was able to be   saved for future generations.                           8

SAVING THE PAST - TEXT RESTORATIONSpindleyQ - He wrote a web based text  editor that let you overlay screen-   shots onto a text window, for         accurate transcribing of Habitat text and without his contribution, this    project would not have been feasible.                                       It would have taken so much time to   transcribe them the old fashioned                     way.                     Special thanks to SpindleyQ!                         9

SAVING THE PAST - TEXT RESTORATIONNick Serra - Thank you for the tape    transfers. Your setup is amazing!                                          Kate Lawson - Contributed to the cost  of transferring the tapes, as well as some pivotal work with restoring      Habitat content from the database     backup we have in the archives.                                                                                                                                           10

SAVING THE PAST - TEXT RESTORATIONStu - It is weird to credit myself,    but here goes.                                                             I found Wil, organised the transfer offootage, badgered Spindley to make theText editor, then sifted thru it all  and transcribed over 400 unique imagesto turn them into Habitat documents.                                        It was a huge project, spanning 10    months, but it was so worth it to me.                    11

SAVING THE PAST - TEXT RESTORATIONIf you are interested in the          preservation of Habitat, Club Caribe  or their descendants such as          WorldsAway and EC Habitats, I documentmy work on that over at my website:                                               https://renoproject.org                                               Sign up over there and keep tabs on   future preservation efforts and thank you for reading this. - Stu           }                                    }                              $                            12        
title: Saving the Past - Text Restoration
